0.title: LiquidBounce b29
0.text: KillAura has been improved and many new AAC bypasses have been added. We also added a Credits screen which allows you to see exactly who helped us developing LiquidBounce. Click here for the full changelog.

1.title: LiquidBounce b31
1.text: We added a HUD Editor which allows you to completely customize the clients GUI to your liking. We also made a new Main Menu design and added a few new AAC bypasses. The full changelog can be found here

2.title: LiquidBounce b32
2.text: Small Hotfix Update. Exact changes can be found here

3.title: LiquidBounce b33
3.text: You can now add to your HUD and KillAura switch mode is now working again when AAC mode is enabled. Exact changes can be found here

4.title: LiquidBounce b34
4.text: We have made some slight improvements to the GUI and fixed a few common bugs. Exact changes can be found here

5.title: LiquidBounce b35
5.text: HOTFIX UPDATE! Please install as quickly as possible. The last release has a bug which causes all keybinds to reset whenever you disable Scaffold. Full changelog can be found here
